title: Drawing, "Perspective and Plan  View of a Spiral Staircase", January 1887
medium: Graphite, brush and watercolor, pen and black ink on cream laid paper
signed:
Inscribed in black ink, upper left: Perspective d’un Ecalier / formant a le demi rond / dans le you[?]
Signed in black ink, lower right: Fait a Marseille / en Janvier 1887 / Adolph Bordeaux
Signed in black ink, lower right: Fait a Marseille / en Janvier 1887 / Adolph Bordeaux
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, upper left: Perspective d’un Ecalier / formant a le demi rond / dans le you[?]
provenance: Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw; 2007: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw
description: Plan and elevation of spiral staircases; with details.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Perspective and Plan  View of a Spiral Staircase", January 1887. Graphite, brush and watercolor, pen and black ink on cream laid paper. Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw. 2007-53-2.
